name: Auditorium Replica
description:
Replica of the Auditorium game

Controls:

Use left mouse button to drag and drop the area effector by clicking on the center.

Left click on the edge to increase their size.

To win the game,  lead the music particles to the fill the music boxes. Each music box represent one of the instrument composing the final track

Official game https://store.steampowered.com/app/205870/Auditorium/

The main goal of this exercise was to learn how to use audiosources, particles, UI, use TMP buttons to do stuff like navigate through a menu, setting up win conditions, timer and objects pooling.
